description:
The elusive Chalktopus is known to hide in the loose chalk in chalk bags and buckets, reaching it's tentacles out to distribute chalk evenly over hands when squeezed. This little creature is a great companion with fine powdered chalk or for those who don't use chalk balls but want something to squeeze in their chalk bag.

  • 8cm diameter fits in most chalk bags
  • Soft tentacles gather loose chalk to coat your hand when grabbed
  • Reduces the likelihood of excess chalk needing to be blown or wiped off your hands
name: Midnight Lightning Chalktopus
